title: To All Non-ADC Players.
body:
I want you to build me a good itemization kit.
There isn't a troll or fuck you part of this, I just thought I would look outside the player-base to see if the community as a whole can find better itemization.

(Let's assume you have 11,000 gold and are level 14)
(The enemy team is {{champion:78}} {{champion:120}}{{champion:134}}  {{champion:51}} {{champion:40}})
(The game is even up to this point)

replies.body:
phantom dancer X3 and boots

jk, which adc are you playing as?

blood thirster, rapidfire cannon(for jhin)/ runnans(for twitch), infinity edge, zzrot portal and swifties.  stick with team, and keep zzrot in the lane that isnt being pushed to keep it in a good spot.

not sure if thats in the gold cost for stuffs, but with that you have enough resistance to not die unless you get caught out and enough damage to take objectives
Would that this was a game that allowed ADCs to build a ZZR and still be relevant at all...
Yeah, cause you do need at least a last whisper for {{champion:78}} and {{champion:120}}, otherwise you won't do any damage to them.
Not enough gold to get all of that. I would have to cut Bloodthirster or ZZ'rot. You also grab Essance Reaver on Jhin before Infinity Edge.
k cut out the blood thirster for vamp scepter and zzr for raptor cloak, should be closer to the gold cost. any deviance would depend on your team comp and what they are building.

I think this is more dependent on your team comp and your ADC. 

If I was a crazy man, I'd tell you to grab steraks at one point for the burst, but GA night be better. 

Don't bother trying to dual anyone unless you're stupid fed (so I would ignore PD. Caitlyn will outrange you before you can get the passive going). Don't over extend because Hecarim will be behind you before you realize your mistake. Stay away from walls and watch Syndra's balls positioning.

I would contribute to this post

but my 0% autofill ADC winrate tells me otherwise
